import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import './App.css'; import { getMovielist, searchMovie } from "./api" const App = () => { const [popularMovies, setPopularMovies] = useState([]) const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState(""); useEffect(() => { getMovielist().then((results) => { setPopularMovies(results) }) }, []) const PopularMovieList = () => { return popularMovies.map((movie, i) => { return (
{movie.title}
{movie.release_date}
{movie.vote_average}
) }) } const search = async (query) => { const results = await searchMovie(query); setPopularMovies(results); } const handleSearchInputChange = (event) => { const { value } = event.target; setSearchQuery(value); search(value); } return (
TV Daniel
); } export default App;
